oshiSkill.name: マスコット創造  ("Mascot Creation")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] You may reveal one Mascot from your deck, add it to your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

spOshiSkill.name: フブキングダム  ("Fubukingdom")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When one of your White Holomen downs an opponent’s Holomen, for every 2 Mascots attached to all of your Holomen, roll a die. If at least one odd number is rolled, your opponent loses 1 Life.

oshiSkill.name: HALU
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) Archive a Green Cheer from one of your holomems, then reveal a Cheer from your Cheer Deck and send it to any of your holomems. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.

spOshiSkill.name: 極彩色の宴 ("A Colorful Feast")
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per game) The Arts of each of your holomems with #IDGen2 gain +20 power for each color of Cheer attached to that holomem, until the end of this turn.

oshiSkill.name: Ahoy
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Bloom one of your #3rdGen Holomen that Bloomed this turn again by using a Holomen from your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 出航~!  ("Shukkou~!")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Deal 50 special damage to either the opposing Center Holomen or Collaboration Holomen for each Holomen stacked under your Center Holomen, Houshou Marine.

oshiSkill.name: ぽえぽえぽえ～  ("poepoepoe~")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If your center Holomen is Sakamata Chloe, you may use this ability: Look at the top three cards of your deck. You may either archive all of them or place them back on top of your deck in any order.

spOshiSkill.name: 人生リセットボタン  ("Life Reset Button")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Count the cards in your hand. Return all cards in your hand and all Holomen from your Archive to your deck, then shuffle it. For each card returned from your hand to the deck, draw one card.

oshiSkill.name: ねえ”え”え”え”え”え”("Neeeeeee")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] When you roll a die due to the ability of Murasaki Shion, you may reroll the die once..

spOshiSkill.name: シオンのすごい魔法  ("Shion's Amazing Magic")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When your purple Center Holomen uses an Art, you may activate this effect: Deal 50 special damage to your opponent's Center Holomen for each Cheer attached to it.

oshiSkill.name: ゾンビ戦術 ("Zombie Tactics")
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) Bloom one of your holomems with #IDGen2 using a holomem from your Archive.

spOshiSkill.name: 蘇るオリー ("Ollie resurrection")
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per game) Draw 4 cards, then Archive 2 cards from your hand. Then, you may Bloom one of your holomems using a holomem from your Archive.

oshiSkill.name: サンプリング ("Sampling")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Archive 2 cards from your hand, and return 2 holomems with #EN from your Archive to your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: 死神ラップ  ("Shinigami Rap")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] If your center Holomen is <Mori Calliope>, you can use this ability: For the duration of this turn, your <Mori Calliope> can use the same Arts twice, once after using it.
